alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 01 at 1:03PM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 6 PM CST Friday. * WINDS...West shifting to northwest at 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas outside the warning as far north as HWY 6 in Nebraska could see near critical conditions as well. A major concern will be the abrupt wind shift with the frontal passage. Winds will abruptly shift from west to northwest behind the front Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
